text: Traction and fund raising are as important as the product and team itself.
Input metrics are more important than the output ones.
Read a lot. A lot. Never stop reading. Just ten pages a day also means one book a month. Never forget that.
The best ideas come to you when your mind is clear

text: Don't look for star hires. Your stars are hidden in your team

text: Some of the best hires at Unacademy are people whom I had already known in the past. Build relationships that last. Universe is small.
Look for people who are inherently inspired to do great. Who don't need constant motivation. And above all who believe in mission.
Learnings from the past couple of months.   One cannot inspire people
column4: one can motivate them. Motivation is short term - inspiration L.T.
